newsitem.title: USA: Most U.S. debt futures remain up after 2-year sale.
newsitem.headline: Most U.S. debt futures remain up after 2-year sale.

text.p: May 28 - Most U.S. debt futures remained slightly higher after two-year note auction results were released. June T-bonds shaved a few ticks after the results, but price action was calm. Treasury auctioned $16.5 billion of two-year notes at 6.328 pct, 42 pct at high. Non-comp bids $1.41 bln and bid-to-cover ratio 2.43.
